committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to give veterans who have received a Purple Heart additional points on the Civil Service examination, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the definition of "preference eligible" for purposes of provisions governing Federal employment to include any veteran who is the recipient of a Purple Heart.

titles.title: A bill to give veterans who have received a Purple Heart additional points on the Civil Service examination, and for other purposes.
